author: The Film Theorists
description:
*🍿 Subscribe for a tasty bucket of popcorn!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

Why are there SO MANY live action remakes? Lilo & Stitch, How to Train Your Dragon, Snow White, Mufasa, The Little Mermaid…WHY? Well, the truth is… they’ve kind of been making them all along, and we just didn’t really realize it…

title: Film Theory: Why is EVERYTHING a Live Action Remake?
